user.title: HACS Energy Scheduler
user.description: Configure the energy scheduler integration. Select the sensors for energy prices and the inverter mode entity.

data_description.price_buy_sensor: Sensor providing buy energy prices with 'data' attribute
data_description.price_sell_sensor: Sensor providing sell energy prices with 'data' attribute
data_description.inverter_mode_entity: Input select entity controlling inverter modes
data_description.soc_sensor: Optional sensor providing battery state of charge
data_description.ev_stop_condition: Condition to trigger stop for EV charging schedules (uses Home Assistant conditions)

default_mode.title: Default Mode
default_mode.description: Select the default inverter mode to apply when no scheduled action is active.

data_description.default_mode: Mode to apply after scheduled actions complete

abort.no_inverter_modes: No modes found in the inverter mode entity

basic.title: Basic Settings
basic.description: Configure price sensors and inverter entity.

data_description.ev_stop_condition: Condition to trigger stop for EV charging schedules (uses Home Assistant conditions)

battery.title: Battery Optimizer Settings
battery.description: Configure battery parameters for the energy optimizer.

data_description.battery_soc_sensor: Sensor providing battery state of charge (%)
data_description.battery_min_soc: Never discharge below this SOC level
data_description.battery_cost: Purchase cost of the battery (for cycle cost calculation)
data_description.battery_cycles: Expected total battery cycles (for wear calculation)

forecast.title: PV Forecast & Consumption
forecast.description: Configure solar forecast and consumption settings.

data_description.pv_forecast_sensor: Solcast or Forecast.Solar sensor for PV production forecast
data_description.avg_consumption: Average hourly power consumption of your home
data_description.max_grid_power: Maximum power available from the grid (limits concurrent charging)

data_description.ev_soc_sensor: Sensor providing EV state of charge (%)
data_description.ev_target_soc: Target SOC to charge EV to
data_description.ev_connected_sensor: Sensor indicating if EV is connected/plugged in
data_description.ev_ready_by: Time by which EV should be charged (optional)

modes.title: Inverter Mode Mapping
modes.description: Map optimizer actions to your inverter modes.

data_description.mode_charge_battery: Mode for charging battery from grid
data_description.mode_charge_ev_and_battery: Mode for charging both EV and battery
data_description.mode_sell: Mode for selling/discharging battery to grid
data_description.mode_sell_solar_only: Mode for selling only solar production
data_description.mode_grid_only: Mode to use grid only (don't discharge battery)

data_description.auto_optimize: Automatically run optimization based on interval
data_description.optimize_interval: How often to run the optimization algorithm

set_schedule.name: Set Schedule
set_schedule.description: Set a scheduled action for a specific hour

date.name: Date
date.description: The date for the schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format)

soc_limit.name: SOC Limit
soc_limit.description: Stop action when SOC reaches this percentage

full_hour.name: Full Hour
full_hour.description: Run action for the entire hour

minutes.name: Minutes
minutes.description: Run action for this many minutes

run_optimization.name: Run Optimization
run_optimization.description: Analyze prices and PV forecast to create an optimal schedule

hours_ahead.name: Planning Horizon
hours_ahead.description: Number of hours to plan ahead (12-48)
